main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Pasadena, California in November 1956.
interesting points: The object was the size of a basketball with a light that blinked on for 30 seconds, then off, The observation lasted over two minutes, The object faded away in a northerly direction, Numerous conclusions suggest it might have been astronomical, possibly balloon, or an aircraft, The sighting generated concern that it could have been caused by a helicopter.
